verses.name: Jeremiah 49:25
verses.text: How is the city of praise not left, the city of my joy!

verses.name: Jeremiah 49:26
verses.text: Therefore her young men shall fall in her streets, and all the men of war shall be cut off in that day, saith the Lord of hosts.

verses.name: Jeremiah 49:27
verses.text: And I will kindle a fire in the wall of Damascus, and it shall consume the palaces of Ben–hadad.

verses.name: Jeremiah 49:28
verses.text: Concerning Kedar, and concerning the kingdoms of Hazor, which Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon shall smite, thus saith the Lord; Arise ye, go up to Kedar, and spoil the men of the east.
